title: Cozy Casual IV & V - Game Music Pack - Relaxing, Jazz, Casual, Friendly Acoustic
description: Made exclusively for Casual and Cozy games, Cozy Casual is a game music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From neighbors sharing cake to talking animals running restaurants, Cozy Casual IV and Cozy Casual V are game nusic packs brimming with the warmth and charm of heartwarming stories. Infuse your games with the inviting melodies of these packs, perfect for creating delightful and engaging experiences.

Listen to the soundtrack packs here:

  • Cozy Casual IV
  • Cozy Casual V

What's inside:

  • Cozy Casual IV:
  • 7 original high-quality music tracks
  • 7 original high-quality music loops
  • 14 total files
  • Cozy Casual V:
  • 6 original high-quality music tracks
  • 6 original high-quality music loops
  • 12 total files

Both packs include:

  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License


Tracklist:


Cozy Casual IV:


(00:00) 01 - Windfall

(00:33) 02 - Cuatro De Marzo

(01:03) 03 - Risky Solution

(01:37) 04 - Flamingo

(02:07) 05 - Cozy Boss

(02:35) 06 - Risky Solution (Alt Version)

(03:09) 07 - Windfall (Alt Version)


Cozy Casual V:


(00:00) 01 - Atardecer

(00:33) 02 - Friends and Cream

(01:03) 03 - Magic Help

(01:37) 04 - Remember it

(02:07) 05 - Before the Sunshine

(02:35) 06 - Horizons


(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


With these game music/soundtrack packs, you also:

  • Sounds great in any device: All music themes are fully mixed and mastered, ensuring high-quality audio across all platforms.
  • Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes are mastered to achieve consistent volume throughout the soundtrack.
  • Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, providing uninterrupted audio for gameplay.


About the composer:


Lufus is a music producer and composer known for creating the Original Soundtracks for multi-million downloaded games, including:

  • Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)
  • Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)
  • Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads) and more


Support & Help:

If you need help downloading these soundtrack/music packs, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Perfect for Cozy Games: Capture the heart and charm of heartwarming games with music designed for casual, feel-good experiences.
  • Two unique packs (IV & V): Provides a diverse palette of cozy music to suit a variety of in-game moods and settings.
  • High-Quality Audio: WAV format delivers pristine, clear audio for an immersive gaming experience.
  • Seamlessly loopable: All music tracks loop flawlessly, allowing for continuous playback without any jarring cuts.
  • Mastered for consistency: Enjoy consistent volume and a polished sound across all tracks within each pack.
  • Royalty-Free License: Use the music freely in your commercial and non-commercial projects.

Number of Audio WAVs: 26 Total (14 in Cozy Casual IV & 12 in Cozy Casual V)

Number of Audio Cues: 26 Total (same)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 32bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes (WAV files are platform-independent)

Documentation: https://youtu.be/pgFLOQ2f2u4.

Important/Additional Notes:

  • For support inquiries, contact the composer at iamlufus@gmail.com.
